text:
Use Angular or Vue on top :wink:
add to the party

the modules should definitely stay modular for sure, you can use webpack as the modern day equivalent of treeshaking for this right?

your implementation outcome would be super helpful here for sure so make sure to feedback!

Yes! Please keep us up to date!
We use Preact (<https://preactjs.com/>) instead of React which fixed a few of our conflicts.
We only use it for simple apps like project overviews with filters etc.
I can share our setup if you want.
